00001 #include "DecoderSet.hh"

00003 namespace CALICE {
00004 
00005   const std::string DecoderSet::_defaultCellIDEncoding("M:3,S-1:3,I:9,J:9,K-1:6");
00006   const std::string DecoderSet::_defaultModuleEncoding("module:0:6,chip:6:5,chan:11:5,SiPM:16:16");
00007   const std::string DecoderSet::_defaultDAQEncoding("channel:8,chip:4,fe:3,slot:5,crate:8");

00010   DecoderSet::DecoderSet() : _IFromCellID(0),_JFromCellID(0), _KFromCellID(0),
00011                              _moduleFromModuleID(0), _chipFromModuleID(0),_channelFromModuleID(0),
00012                              _channelFromDAQID(0), _chipFromDAQID(0), _feFromDAQID(0),
00013                              _slotFromDAQID(0), _crateFromDAQID(0) 
00014   {
00015     setCellIDEncoding(_defaultCellIDEncoding);
00016     setModuleEncoding(_defaultModuleEncoding);
00017     setDAQEncoding(_defaultDAQEncoding);
00018   }

00020 
00021   DecoderSet::DecoderSet(const std::string& cellIDencoding, 
00022                          const std::string& moduleEncoding, 
00023                          const std::string& DAQencoding ) :
00024     _IFromCellID(0),_JFromCellID(0), _KFromCellID(0),
00025     _moduleFromModuleID(0), _chipFromModuleID(0),_channelFromModuleID(0),
00026     _channelFromDAQID(0), _chipFromDAQID(0), _feFromDAQID(0), _slotFromDAQID(0), _crateFromDAQID(0) 
00027   {
00028     setCellIDEncoding(cellIDencoding);
00029     setModuleEncoding(moduleEncoding);
00030     setDAQEncoding(DAQencoding);
00031   }
00032 
00033   /*
00034     Generating the FastDecoder is expensive in terms of speed.
00035     By using a map for each encoding, we don't have to generate
00036     the FastDecoder again, if the encoding has already been used.
00037   */
00038 
00039   void DecoderSet::setCellIDEncoding(const std::string &encoding) {
00040     if (encoding == "") _cellIDencodingString = _defaultCellIDEncoding;
00041     else                _cellIDencodingString = encoding;
00042 
00043     mokkaDecoderMap_t::iterator it = _mokkaDecoderMap.find(encoding);
00044 
00045     if ( it == _mokkaDecoderMap.end() ) {
00046       _IFromCellID = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_cellIDencodingString, "I");
00047       _JFromCellID = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_cellIDencodingString, "J");
00048       _KFromCellID = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_cellIDencodingString, "K");
00049 
00050       MokkaID_t decoders;
00051       decoders.forI = _IFromCellID;
00052       decoders.forJ = _JFromCellID;
00053       decoders.forK = _KFromCellID;
00054 
00055       _mokkaDecoderMap[encoding] = decoders;
00056     }
00057     else {
00058       _IFromCellID = it->second.forI;
00059       _JFromCellID = it->second.forJ;
00060       _KFromCellID = it->second.forK;
00061     }
00062   }
00063 
00064   void DecoderSet::setModuleEncoding(const std::string &encoding) {
00065     if (encoding == "") _moduleIDEncodingString = _defaultModuleEncoding;
00066     else  _moduleIDEncodingString = encoding;
00067 
00068     if (_moduleFromModuleID)  delete _moduleFromModuleID;
00069     if (_chipFromModuleID)    delete _chipFromModuleID;
00070     if (_channelFromModuleID) delete _channelFromModuleID;
00071     _moduleFromModuleID  = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_moduleIDEncodingString,"module");
00072     _chipFromModuleID    = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_moduleIDEncodingString,"chip");
00073     _channelFromModuleID = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_moduleIDEncodingString,"chan");
00074   }
00075 
00076 
00077   void DecoderSet::setDAQEncoding(const std::string &encoding) {
00078     if (encoding == "") _daqIDencodingString = _defaultDAQEncoding;
00079     else _daqIDencodingString = encoding;
00080 
00081     if (_channelFromDAQID) delete _channelFromDAQID;
00082     if (_chipFromDAQID)    delete _chipFromDAQID;
00083     if (_feFromDAQID)      delete _feFromDAQID;
00084     if (_slotFromDAQID)    delete _slotFromDAQID;
00085     if (_crateFromDAQID)   delete _crateFromDAQID;
00086     _channelFromDAQID = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_daqIDencodingString,"channel");
00087     _chipFromDAQID    = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_daqIDencodingString,"chip");
00088     _feFromDAQID      = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_daqIDencodingString,"fe");
00089     _slotFromDAQID    = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_daqIDencodingString,"slot");
00090     _crateFromDAQID   = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(_daqIDencodingString,"crate");
00091   }
00092 
00093 } // end namespace CALICE
